bookPages:
Andyr News
by Le Sage








Andyr is the capital of the High Humans.  We have made this town to be the Foundation of Civilization.  We are a close comunity working together to aid in the betterment of the world.  We have here the Hanging Gardens

where our citizens can farm and gather the nutrients of life.
Also we have the Grand Library which is the largest library on this contenent.  We will soon have the mages guild and a college to help the world in these dark times.  Welcome and feel free

to look around.  Any wandering High Humans are welcome here.  We have rent houses for $250 a week or you could buy a plot.  Houses cost $3000 a plot and shops and embassies cost $5000. We have a persian theme that is strickly enforced.  If you are
not confident in your building abilities feel free to employ any of  our masons.  Welcome and enjoy your stay.
